FuncDef:
The interface-name command adds an interface to an outbound interface list.
The undo interface-name command deletes an interface from an outbound interface list.
By default, no interface is added to an outbound interface list.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To allow routes with the next hop being a specified interface to pass the check, run the interface-name command to add the interface to an outbound interface list. After the list is applied to the route-filter, the device will then not filter out those routes.
Prerequisites
An outbound interface list has been configured using the xpl interface-list command.
